requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4130T (2.90 GHz) / AMD A8 3850 (2.9 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 (Shared), AMD Radeon HD Graphics 6550 (Shared)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570K (3.40 GHz) / AMD FX 8120 (3.10 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (2 GB), AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
